jpoFile

create

public void create(matrix.db.Context _context,
                   Map<String,String> _class2Pck,
                   String _version)
            throws IOException,
                   matrix.util.MatrixException
Creates the JPO new and appends the properties for the author, installer, installed date, application and original name.

Parameters:
_context - context for this request
_class2Pck - used JPO name within the code and the related class name
_version - application version
Throws:
IOException - if the JPO file could not be read
matrix.util.MatrixException - if the JPO could not created
See Also:
update(Context, Map, String)

update

public void update(matrix.db.Context _context,
                   Map<String,String> _class2Pck,
                   String _version)
            throws IOException,
                   matrix.util.MatrixException
Because there is a different behavior for backslashes between MX versions, the JPO program must be included. So the source code is only updated so that the source code includes for all used classes the depending package names.

Parameters:
_context - context for this request
_class2Pck - used JPO name within the code and the related class name
_version - application version
Throws:
IOException - if the JPO file could not be read
matrix.util.MatrixException - if the JPO could not updated
See Also:
getCode(Map)

getCode

private CharSequence getCode(Map<String,String> _class2Pck)
                      throws IOException
Parameters:
_class2Pck - used JPO name within the code and the related class name
Returns:
code in the MQL syntax
Throws:
IOException - if the file could not be read
